long_description: The slim and lightweight GoPro replacement housing can be used as a spare or replacement for all HERO3 or HERO3+ cameras. The flat glass lens delivers maximum image sharpness above and below water. Large buttons make it easy to control the camera, even while wearing gloves or mittens. The GoPro replacement housing is waterproof to 131 ft. (40m). Includes Standard + Skeleton Backdoors.
short_description: The slim and lightweight GoPro replacement housing can be used as a spare or replacement for all HERO3 or HERO3+ cameras.
